definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: ] go around (intrans.), (Sir 45:9 Hiph. [[ויקיפהו]] surround something with (2 acc.); Pf. 3 fs. [[הקיפה]] Sir 43:12 (acc.+ [[ב]] instr.); NH Hiph. [[הִקִּיף]] = BH; also = cling to, be attached, joined to, and so Aram. [[אַקֵּיף]] (Aph.), nqep);

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. [[חַגִּים יִנְקָׂפוּ]] Is 29:1 (fig.) let feasts go around, i.e. run the round (of the year).

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: go around, c. acc. of city, Jos 6:3 cf. v:Jos 6:11 (acc. om.), Ps 48:13 (a11 ‖[[סָבָב]]); also (fig.) [[הִקִּ֫יפָה הַזְּעָקָה אֶת־]] Is 15:8 the cry hath gone about the border of Moab.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: surround, encompass, enclose, usu. c. [[עַל־]]: [[וַיַּקִּ֫פוּ]] [[עַל־הָעִיר]] 2Ki 6:14 and they closed in upon the city (beleaguered it); c. [[עַל]] pers. 2Ki 11:8 (+ [[סָבִיב]]), Ps 17:9, Ps 88:18 (‖[[סָבַב]]), + acc. rei Job 19:6 he hath closed his net in upon me cf. La 3:5; less oft. c. acc. pers. Ps 22:17 (‖[[סָבַב]]), 2Ch 23:7 (‖ 2Ki 11:8; + [[סָבִיב]]), also of inanim. things 1Ki 7:24 = 2Ch 4:3 (both + [[סָבִיב]], ‖[[סָבַב]]).
make the round, i.e. complete the circuit [[יְמֵי הַמִּשְׁתֶּה]] ´[[הִקּ]] Job 1:5 when the days of feasting had completed their circuit.
make round, round off (lit.): [[פְּאַת ראׂשְׁכֶם]] ´[[לאׂ חַקּ]] Le 19:27 (‖[[לאׂ תַשְׁחִית אֵת פְּאַת]] [[זְקָנְֶ֑]]), of heathen rite.
